caption.center: PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF MICHIGAN, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. GENE RAYMOND

opinion.opinion_text:
Order
SC: 142516, COA: 299205, Macomb CC: 2008-003523-FH
On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the December 2, 2010 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because the defendant has failed to meet the burden of establishing entitlement to relief under MCR 6.508(D).Page 1
